name: Another Day of Work
description:
The world I want to build, a place away from here.

This was an attempt by me to start some kind of potion brewing system. I got as far as the inventory and some pickups, but I did learn a lot.

Controls:

WASD to move

I to open the inventory

E to interact

Esc to quit

Assets used:

Quixel by MysteryCorgi

Top Down Interior Tileset by Raou

I will try and keep updating this. Keep an eye on my Twitter.
